DOC.criteria: Subjects Cystic Fibrosis Stockholm Cystic Fibrosis center > 18 year age Forced expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) 20 69 % predict value Developed alveolar hypoventilation physical performance test Use oxygen supplementation aerobic training Symptomatic upper airway infection characterize fever less 1 month enter study Cognitive dysfunction Cardiorespiratory instability Infection Burkholderia cepacia complex Gastroesophageal reflux History pneumothorax Massive hemoptysis .
